comments.body: Triggered auto assignment to @kevinksullivan (`Bug`), see https://stackoverflow.com/c/expensify/questions/14418 for more details.

### Bug0 Triage Checklist ([Main S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418))

- [ ] This "bug" occurs on a supported platform (ensure `Platforms` in OP are ✅)
- [ ] This bug is not a duplicate report (check [E/App issues](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues) and [#expensify-bugs](https://expensify.slack.com/archives/C049HHMV9SM))
    - If it is, comment with a link to the original report, close the issue and add any novel details to the original issue instead
- [ ] This bug is reproducible using the reproduction steps in the OP. [S/O](https://stackoverflowteams.com/c/expensify/questions/14418#:~:text=The%20bug%20is%20reproducible)
    - If the reproduction steps are clear and you're unable to reproduce the bug, check with the reporter and QA first, then close the issue.
    - If the reproduction steps aren't clear and you determine the correct steps, please update the OP.
- [ ] This issue is filled out as thoroughly and clearly as possible
    - Pay special attention to the title, results, platforms where the bug occurs, and if the bug happens on staging/production.
- [ ] I have reviewed and subscribed to the linked Slack conversation to ensure Slack/Github stay in sync
Triggered auto assignment to Contributor-plus team member for initial proposal review - @akinwale (`External`)

## Proposal

### Please re-state the problem that we are trying to solve in this issue.
Popover Context menu is not updating it's position on dimension change
### What is the root cause of that problem?
This is a bug created by [this pr](https://github.com/Expensify/App/pull/27221) which migrates `PopoverReportActionContextMenu` from class to functional component. It has broken the context menu position updating logic on dimension change. There are a couple of mistakes made on that pr and my RCA can be directly infered from my solution listed below 👍 
### What changes do you think we should make in order to solve the problem?
<!-- DO NOT POST CODE DIFFS -->
We need to change back `popoverAnchorPosition` from ref into a state otherwise our `PopoverWithMeasuredContent` component will not rerender on anchor position change.
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/PopoverReportActionContextMenu.js#L28-L31
```
   const [popoverAnchorPosition, setPopoverAnchorPosition] = useState({
        horizontal: 0,
        vertical: 0,
    });
```
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/PopoverReportActionContextMenu.js#L89-L92
```
setPopoverAnchorPosition({
                horizontal: cursorRelativePosition.current.horizontal + x,
                vertical: cursorRelativePosition.current.vertical + y,
            });
```
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/PopoverReportActionContextMenu.js#L169-L172
```
setPopoverAnchorPosition({
                horizontal: nativeEvent.pageX,
                vertical: nativeEvent.pageY,
            });
```
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/PopoverReportActionContextMenu.js#L155
```
        contextMenuAnchorRef.current = contextMenuAnchor.current;

```
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/PopoverReportActionContextMenu.js#L164-L167
```
cursorRelativePosition.current = {
                horizontal: nativeEvent.pageX - x,
                vertical: nativeEvent.pageY - y,
            };
```
lastly change
https://github.com/Expensify/App/blob/b4f001de6b3fe232a0f5aee5316b18557b740d86/src/pages/home/report/ContextMenu/PopoverReportActionContextMenu.js#L293
```
                anchorPosition={popoverAnchorPosition}

```
POC:

https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/38649957/adf31555-b4c0-4a6f-b223-ad7b592ae9bf



### What alternative solutions did you explore? (Optional)

Might be a good idea to hold this issue until the following is merged or maybe combine them as they both deal with the pop up being misaligned when the screen is resized. 

- https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/29729

> @FitseTLT unless i am missing something here, this particular issue aims to solve the issue for wallet screen popover not the context menu for chat it should be treated as a seperate issue (if it is a issue as far as i guess this is expected for context menu and this does not create any ui inconsistency) you can raise this on slack channel if you are sure this is a issue needs to fixed and there's no GH handling that already

Thanks @ishpaul777 you're right. Because I couldn't add a bank account (via Plaid) when I reproduced exact bug with PopoverReportActionContextMenu I thought we were using the same popover 🙏 in the wallet page.
@akinwale @kevinksullivan Can U help create a new issue to deal with the `PopoverReportActionContextMenu` repositioning issue commented in my [proposal](https://github.com/Expensify/App/issues/31706#issuecomment-1823347399) and indicated below in the videos. It is even more important issue than this one b/c `PopoverReportActionContextMenu` is far more commonly used popover menu.

https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/38649957/87749c60-57b5-416b-8d86-1f34a41281a1


https://github.com/Expensify/App/assets/38649957/c1533975-6141-4b82-9691-c75a158660f6
